page.title: 16The A1 Trunk Road.
page.content: Across the Eastern part of the grid runs the A1 trunk road.It forms an {important part}of the road network in Great{Britain.}It is an{extremely busy stretch of road.On Tuesday June 25th 1985 the traffic was flowing at the rate of{1500 vehicles an hour.}The majority of the vehicles are heavy lorries which are{transporting goods around the country.As a result of this heavy traffic,{a flyover and {interchange}is being constructed,at the cost of{many millions of pounds. It is hoped that this will reduce the danger to motorists who wish to cross or join the A1 at Barnsdale Bar.
